title: Drawing, 1957-58-23, 1899–1900
medium: Graphite; brush and gray wash and white gouache on white wove paper
signed: In paint lower left: Corwin K. Linson
inscribed:
Across top edge: the title in painted border with floral motifs.
In graphite at lower center: 2 1/2 inches
creditline: Gift of F. Elizabeth De Voy
description: Scene depicts the courtyard of a mediterranean home, shaded by a grape arbor, with chickens pecking underneath at right.  A woman sits on a flight of steps at left, spinning a distaff.
